TopicTitle: KSP2 Loading Error "Loading Localizations from Addressables"

Articles.Content:
This issue has been talked about and resolved on this forum before, but its just my luck that it doesn't work for me.

 

Ok, so quick backstory.

I stepped away from KSP2 a few months ago, to wait for optimization to be done so I could, you know, actually play the game. Once I return, I find that the loading screen freezes on "Loading Localizations from Addressables."

So I looked through this forum, tried all the listed solutions, I even uninstalled the entire game, but still no good, it still wont load.

 

I'm at a loss here, I don't know what to do anymore. Would someone be willing to give me a hand?

Hello, I just created an account to reply to this post with a solution:
The same issue happened to me, a few months ago I played a lot, and (just today) started to play agin and faced the same loading screen issue.
I had to go to the KSP2 directory (default for me is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program 2) and delete my BepInEx folder and my CKAN folder (I used to do KSP2 modding and I now assume the issue was because of these outdated folders/mods)
These folders still remained there even after reinstalling KSP2, so just go in there and manually delete any folders that shouldn't be there upon the first install, then (if you still want to add mods), just use the new versions of all the tools

Edit: I know this is tagged in unmodded installs, but this is the solution that worked for me with the same message on the loading screen.

Edited October 14, 2023 by MrCreeps
Most mods have been updated since then, this issue shouldn't happen anymore for this version of the game.
